title: Episode #57: Is OCD a disease? And can it be managed?
description:
In this episode I discuss intrusive thoughts and OCD- specifically how to manage both and find freedom from a chaotic mind.
 
The SWITCH app is coming to iTunes and Google Play early 2019!!
For more info on my new app SWITCH go to: https://theswitch.app and get 30% off a year subscription when you pre-order today: http://theswitch.app/promo/
 
**Sign up for my weekly newsletter to get even more tips, updates, specials, and more: https://drleaf.com
dc:creator: Dr. Caroline Leaf
